# finalize()

**Instance Method**

The garbage collector invokes this method on the receiver before disposing of the memory it uses.

## Declaration

```swift
func finalize()
```

## Discussion

This method behaves as described in the `NSObject` class specification under the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/finalize()] instance method. Note that a `finalize` method must be thread-safe.

## Related Documentation

- **dealloc()**: Deallocates the memory occupied by the receiver.
